items.title: Takeaways from the millions of newly released Epstein files
items.description: Three million new documents include hundreds of mentions of Trump and emails between Epstein and a person called "The Duke".

items.title: BBC reports from Oslo court ahead of rape trial of Crown Princess's son
items.description: Norway's royal family has been embroiled in recent scandals, including Crown Princess Mette-Marit links with Epstein.

items.title: Ghana suspends citizenship process for people of African descent
items.description: Since 2016, those who can prove their ancestors came from Africa have been able to get Ghanaian nationality.

items.title: Crown Princess's son arrested for alleged assault before rape trial in Norway
items.description: Marius Borg HÃ¸iby, who goes on trial on Tuesday, has been remanded in custody for four weeks after new allegations.

items.title: Israel reopens Gaza's key Rafah border crossing with Egypt
items.description: Only dozens of Palestinians and no goods will be able to cross in both directions each day.
